img_summary: The image depicts the **Immortal Blessing Gourd**, a legendary item from the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. This gourd is used to recover health, though its healing effect is halved, while temporarily increasing attack power after use. It can be purchased from the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain starting from Chapter 5, provided the player has acquired the Buddha's Left Hand and Buddha's Right Hand items from The Webbed Hollow.
